title: Skybreaker
content:
earing Smite (Level 1 Evocation Spell) Range: 1.5 m

Skybreaker Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found inside a heavy chest in front of the entrance to the Arcane Tower (X:22 Y:-296)

Skybreaker Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 400 Weight: 0.9 ID: ??
